Model.Name: TotalSegmentator
Model.Comments: Segmentation of 104 anatomic structures in CT images, including 27 organs, 59 bones, 10 muscles, and 8 vessels.
Model.Availability: Publicly available via Zenodo and GitHub

Reference.Authors: Wasserthal J, Breit HC, Meyer MT, Pradella M, Hinck D, Sauter AW, Heye T, Boll DT, Cyriac J, Yang S, Bach M, Segeroth M
Reference.Title: TotalSegmentator: Robust segmentation of 104 anatomic structures in CT images

Model.Caveat: The model works robustly across diverse clinical data but has typical failure cases such as missing small parts of organs or mixing up neighboring bones.
Model.Sustainability: Requires less than 12 GB of RAM and does not require a GPU, which allows running on a normal laptop.
Model.Required processor: Local workstation with Intel Core i9 3.5-GHz CPU and NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3090 GPU for checking inference runtime.
